norm2gamma

Source: R/transformation_functions.R
norm2gamma.Rd

Transforms a vector with a normal distribution to a gamma distribution.

Usage

norm2gamma(x, skew)

Arguments

x

Input vector

skew

Desired skew

Value

A vector with a (skewed) gamma distribution

Examples

norm2gamma(x = rnorm(n = 100,mean = 0,sd = 1), skew = 1)
